description:
Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users.

Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users.
It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new movies and will interface with clients and indexers to grab, sort, and rename them.
It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of existing files in the library when a better quality format becomes available.
Note that only one type of a given movie is supported.
If you want both an 4k version and 1080p version of a given movie you will need multiple instances.
To receive further Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)
If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.
The will be the last Radarr v5 release / last dotnet6 release and thus the last release supporting Linux x86. v6 with dotnet8 is in develop and nightly.
What's Changed
- Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in #11210
- UI Updates by @bakerboy448 in #11224
- New: Changing icon during import to blue by @ineednewpajamas in #11225
- New: (NFO Metadata) Include the TMDB Collection ID by @MaienM in #11164
